item.title: CVE-2024-44051|2024-09-18T13:36:35.791Z -- johan%20van%20der%20wijk -- content%20blocks%20%28custom%20post%20widget%29
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Johan van der Wijk Content Blocks (Custom Post Widget) allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Content Blocks (Custom Post Widget): from n/a through 3.3.5.
